content: this legal case involves a coownership property specifically a twobedroom apartment in varaždin the court has determined that the coownership should be dissolved and the property sold through a public auction the money obtained from the sale will be divided among the coowners based on their ownership shares the court has rejected objections from the counterparty stating that a physical division of the property is not feasible the court has also rejected claims of a violation of the litigation procedure the court has determined that the termination of the coownership agreement would not be detrimental to the coowners the court has explained that the establishment of condominium ownership is another option but the counterparty opposes this the court has clarified that the provisions for forced sale of real estate do not apply in this case and the civil division of the coownership should proceed
